record.condition: (evaluate(db.mass.update in $L.env) or evaluate(db.complex in $L.env) or evaluate(db.template in $L.env) or filename($L.file)="rootcause" and (pm.template in $G.rc.environment or pm.complex in $G.rc.environment) or filename($L.file)="rootcausetask" and (pmt.template in $G.rc.environment or pmt.complex in $G.rc.environment) or filename($L.file)="knownerror" and (kne.template in $G.rc.environment or kne.complex in $G.rc.environment) or filename($L.file)="knownerrortask" and (ket.template in $G.rc.environment or ket.complex in $G.rc.environment)) and filename($L.filed)~="dbdict"
record.condition.txt: (evaluate(db.mass.update in $L.env) or evaluate(db.complex in $L.env) or evaluate(db.template in $L.env) or filename($L.file)="rootcause" and (pm.template in $G.rc.environment or pm.complex in $G.rc.environment) or filename($L.file)="rootcausetask" and (pmt.template in $G.rc.environment or pmt.complex in $G.rc.environment) or filename($L.file)="knownerror" and (kne.template in $G.rc.environment or kne.complex in $G.rc.environment) or filename($L.file)="knownerrortask" and (ket.template in $G.rc.environment or ket.complex in $G.rc.environment)) and filename($L.filed)~="dbdict"
